pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Commander Plug-in for Repeated-Measures ANOVA // R Commander plug-in for repeated-measures and mixed-design ('split-plot') ANOVA. It adds a new menu entry for repeated measures that allows to deal with up to three within-subject factors and optionally with one or several between-subject factors. It also provides supplementary options to oneWayAnova() and multiWayAnova() functions, such as choice of ANOVA type, display of effect sizes and post hoc analysis for multiWayAnova().
